param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_geno
param.label: Set Geno
param.help: Exclude variants with missing call frequencies greater than a threshold (default 0.1). (Note that the default threshold is only applied if --geno is invoked without a parameter; when --geno is not invoked, no per-variant missing call frequency ceiling is enforced at all. Other inclusion/exclusion default thresholds work the same way.)

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_mind
param.label: Set Mind
param.help: Exclude samples with missing call frequencies greater than a threshold (default 0.1).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_oblig_missing
param.label: Set Oblig missing
param.help: Specify blocks of missing genotype calls for --geno/--mind to ignore. The first file should have variant IDs in the first column and block IDs in the second, while the second file should have FIDs in the first column, IIDs in the second, and block IDs in the third.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_prune
param.label: Set Prune
param.help: Remove samples with missing phenotypes.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_maf
param.label: Set Maf
param.help: Exclude variants with minor allele frequency lower than a threshold (default 0.01).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_max_maf
param.label: Set Max maf
param.help: Exclude variants with MAF greater than the threshold.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_mac
param.label: Set Mac
param.help: Exclude variants with minor allele count lower than the (alias: --min-ac) given threshold.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_max_mac
param.label: Set Max mac
param.help: Exclude variants with minor allele count greater than (alias: --max-ac) the given threshold.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_maf_succ
param.label: Set Maf succ
param.help: Rule of succession MAF estimation (used in EIGENSOFT). Given j observations of one allele and k >= j observations of the other, infer a MAF of (j+1) / (j+k+2), rather than the default j / (j+k).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_read_freq
param.label: Set Read freq
param.help: Estimate MAFs and heterozygote frequencies from the given --freq{x} report, instead of the input fileset.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_hwe
param.label: Set Hwe
param.help: Exclude variants with Hardy-Weinberg equilibrium exact test p-values below a threshold.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_me
param.label: Set Me
param.help: Filter out trios and variants with Mendel error rates exceeding the given thresholds.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_me_exclude_one
param.label: Set Me exclude one
param.help: Make --me exclude only one sample per trio.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_qual_scores
param.label: Set Qual scores
param.help: Filter out variants with out-of-range quality scores. Default range is now [0, \infty ).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_qual_threshold
param.label: Set Qual threshold
param.help: Set --qual-scores range floor.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_qual_max_threshold
param.label: Set Qual max threshold
param.help: Set --qual-scores range ceiling.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_allow_no_sex
param.label: Set Allow no sex
param.help: Do not treat ambiguous-sex samples as having missing phenotypes in analysis commands. (Automatic /w --no-sex.)

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_must_have_sex
param.label: Set Must have sex
param.help: Force ambiguous-sex phenotypes to missing on --make-bed/--make-just-fam/--recode/--write-covar.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_filter_cases
param.label: Set Filter cases
param.help: Include only cases in the current analysis.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_filter_controls
param.label: Set Filter controls
param.help: Include only controls.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_filter_males
param.label: Set Filter males
param.help: Include only males.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_filter_females
param.label: Set Filter females
param.help: Include only females.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_filter_founders
param.label: Set Filter founders
param.help: Include only founders.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_filter_nonfounders
param.label: Set Filter nonfounders
param.help: Include only nonfounders.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_nonfounders
param.label: Set Nonfounders
param.help: Include nonfounders in allele freq/HWE calculations.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_make_founders
param.label: Set Make founders
param.help: Clear parental IDs for those with 1+ missing parent(s).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_recode_allele
param.label: Set Recode allele
param.help: With --recode A/A-transpose/AD, count alleles named in the file (otherwise A1 alleles are always counted).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_output_chr
param.label: Set Output chr
param.help: Set chromosome coding scheme in output files by providing the desired human mitochondrial code. (Options are '26', 'M', 'MT', '0M', 'chr26', 'chrM', and 'chrMT'.)

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_output_missing_genotype
param.label: Set Output missing genotype
param.help: Set the code used to represent missing genotypes in output files (normally the --missing-genotype value).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_output_missing_phenotype
param.label: Set Output missing phenotype
param.help: Set the string used to represent missing phenotypes in output files (normally the --missing-phenotype value).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_zero_cluster
param.label: Set Zero cluster
param.help: In combination with --within/--family, set blocks of genotype calls to missing. The input file should have variant IDs in the first column and cluster IDs in the second. This must now be used with --make-bed and no other output commands.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_set_hh_missing
param.label: Set Set hh missing
param.help: Cause --make-bed and --recode to set heterozygous haploid genotypes to missing.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_set_mixed_mt_missing
param.label: Set Set mixed mt missing
param.help: Cause --make-bed and --recode to set mixed MT genotypes to missing.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_OVERLOADED_SELECT_split_x
param.label: Choose argument form for Split_x
param.help: Overloaded argument, must chose a form

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_split_x
param.label: Set Split x
param.help: Changes chromosome code of all X chromosome

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_split_x
param.label: Set Split x
param.help: * 'b36'/'hg18' = NCBI 36, 2709521/154584237 * 'b37'/'hg19' = GRCh37, 2699520/154931044 * 'b38'/'hg38' = GRCh38, 2781479/155701383 By default, PLINK errors out when no variants would be affected by --split-x; the 'no-fail' modifier (useful in scripts) overrides this.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_merge_x
param.label: Set Merge x
param.help: Merge XY chromosome back with X.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_set_me_missing
param.label: Set Set me missing
param.help: Cause --make-bed to set Mendel errors to missing.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_fill_missing_a2
param.label: Set Fill missing a2
param.help: Cause --make-bed to replace all missing calls with homozygous A2 calls.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_set_missing_var_ids
param.label: Set Set missing var ids
param.help: Given a template string with a '@' where the chromosome code should go and '#' where the bp coordinate belongs, --set-missing-var-ids assigns chromosome-and-bp-based IDs to unnamed variants. You may also use '$1' and '$2' to refer to allele names in the template string, and in fact this becomes essential when multiple variants share the same coordinate.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_new_id_max_allele_len
param.label: Set New id max allele len
param.help: Specify maximum number of leading characters from allele names to include in new variant IDs (default 23).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_missing_var_code
param.label: Set Missing var code
param.help: Change unnamed variant code (default '.').

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_update_chr
param.label: Set Update chr
param.help: Update variant chromosome codes.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_update_cm
param.label: Set Update cm
param.help: Update centimorgan positions.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_update_map
param.label: Set Update map
param.help: Update variant bp positions.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_update_name
param.label: Set Update name
param.help: Update variant IDs.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_update_alleles
param.label: Set Update alleles
param.help: Update variant allele codes.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_allele1234
param.label: Set Allele1234
param.help: Interpret/recode A/C/G/T alleles as 1/2/3/4. With 'multichar', converts all A/C/G/Ts in allele names to 1/2/3/4s.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_alleleACGT
param.label: Set Alleleacgt
param.help: Reverse of --allele1234.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_update_ids
param.label: Set Update ids
param.help: Update sample IDs.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_update_parents
param.label: Set Update parents
param.help: Update parental IDs.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_update_sex
param.label: Set Update sex
param.help: Update sexes. Sex (1 or M = male, 2 or F = female, 0 = missing) is loaded from column n+2 (default n is 1).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_flip
param.label: Set Flip
param.help: Flip alleles (A<->T, C<->G) for SNP IDs in the file.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_flip_subset
param.label: Set Flip subset
param.help: Only apply --flip to samples in --flip-subset file.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_flip_scan_window
param.label: Set Flip scan window
param.help: Set --flip-scan max variant ct dist. (def. 10).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_flip_scan_window_kb
param.label: Set Flip scan window kb
param.help: Set --flip-scan max kb distance (default 1000).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_flip_scan_threshold
param.label: Set Flip scan threshold
param.help: Set --flip-scan min correlation (default 0.5).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_keep_allele_order
param.label: Set Keep allele order
param.help: Keep the allele order defined in the .bim file,

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_a1_allele
param.label: Set A1 allele
param.help: Force alleles in the file to A1.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_a2_allele
param.label: Set A2 allele
param.help: Force alleles in the file to A2. ("--a2-allele [VCF filename] 4 3 '#'", which scrapes reference allele assignments from a VCF file, is especially useful.)

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_indiv_sort
param.label: Set Indiv sort
param.help: Specify FID/IID sort order. The following four modes are supported: * 'none'/'0' keeps samples in the order they were loaded. Default for non-merge operations. * 'natural'/'n' invokes 'natural sort', e.g. 'id2' < 'ID3' < 'id10'. Default when merging. * 'ascii'/'a' sorts in ASCII order, e.g. 'ID3' < 'id10' < 'id2'. * 'file'/'f' uses the order in the given file (named in the second parameter). For now, only --merge/--bmerge/--merge-list and --make-bed/--make-just-fam respect this flag.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_with_phenotype
param.label: Set With phenotype
param.help: Include more sample info in new .cov file.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_dummy_coding
param.label: Set Dummy coding
param.help: Split categorical variables (n categories, 2 < n <= N, default N is 49) into n-1 binary dummy variables when writing covariate file.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_merge_mode
param.label: Set Merge mode
param.help: Adjust --{b}merge/--merge-list behavior based on a numeric code. 1 (default) = ignore missing calls, otherwise difference -> missing 2 = only overwrite originally missing calls 3 = only overwrite when nonmissing in new file 4/5 = never overwrite and always overwrite, respectively 6 = report all mismatching calls without merging 7 = report mismatching nonmissing calls without merging

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_merge_equal_pos
param.label: Set Merge equal pos
param.help: With --merge/--bmerge/--merge-list, merge variants with different names but identical positions. (Exception: same-position chromosome code 0 variants aren't merged.)

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_mendel_duos
param.label: Set Mendel duos
param.help: Make Mendel error checks consider samples with only one parent in the dataset.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_mendel_multigen
param.label: Set Mendel multigen
param.help: Make Mendel error checks consider (great-)grandparental genotypes when parental genotype data is missing.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_ld_window
param.label: Set Ld window
param.help: Set --r/--r2 max variant ct pairwise distance (usu. 10).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_ld_window_kb
param.label: Set Ld window kb
param.help: Set --r/--r2 max kb pairwise distance (usually 1000).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_ld_window_cm
param.label: Set Ld window cm
param.help: Set --r/--r2 max centimorgan pairwise distance.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_ld_window_r2
param.label: Set Ld window r2
param.help: Set threshold for --r2 report inclusion (usually 0.2).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_ld_snp
param.label: Set Ld snp
param.help: Set first variant in all --r/--r2 pairs.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_ld_snps
param.label: Set Ld snps
param.help: Restrict first --r/--r2 variant to the given ranges.

param.name: ld_snps_MOD_0_0
param.label: vID...
param.help: Multiple values are allowed

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_ld_snp_list
param.label: Set Ld snp list
param.help: Restrict first --r/--r2 var. to those named in the file.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_list_all
param.label: Set List all
param.help: Generate the 'all' mode report when using --show-tags in file mode.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_tag_kb
param.label: Set Tag kb
param.help: Set --show-tags max tag kb distance (default 250).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_tag_r2
param.label: Set Tag r2
param.help: Set --show-tags min tag r-squared (default 0.8)

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_tag_mode2
param.label: Set Tag mode2
param.help: Use two-column --show-tags (file mode) I/O format.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_ld_xchr
param.label: Set Ld xchr
param.help: Set Xchr model for --indep{-pairwise}, --r/--r2, --flip-scan, and --show-tags. 1 (default) = males coded 0/1, females 0/1/2 (A1 dosage) 2 = males coded 0/2 3 = males coded 0/2, but females given double weighting

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_blocks_max_kb
param.label: Set Blocks max kb
param.help: Set --blocks maximum haploblock span (def. 200).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_blocks_min_maf
param.label: Set Blocks min maf
param.help: Adjust --blocks MAF minimum (default 0.05).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_blocks_strong_lowci
param.label: Set Blocks strong lowci
param.help: Set --blocks 'strong LD' CI thresholds (defaults

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_blocks_recomb_highci
param.label: Set Blocks recomb highci
param.help: Set 'recombination' CI threshold (default 0.90).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_blocks_inform_frac
param.label: Set Blocks inform frac
param.help: Force haploblock [strong LD pairs]:[total informative pairs] ratios to be larger than this value (default 0.95).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_distance_wts
param.label: Set Distance wts
param.help: When computing genomic distances, assign each variant a weight of (2q(1-q))^{-x}, where q is the loaded or inferred MAF.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_read_dists
param.label: Set Read dists
param.help: Load a triangular binary distance matrix instead of recalculating from scratch.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_ppc_gap
param.label: Set Ppc gap
param.help: Minimum number of base pairs, in thousands, between informative pairs of markers used in --genome PPC test. 500 if unspecified.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_min
param.label: Set Min
param.help: Specify minimum PI_HAT for inclusion in --genome report.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_max
param.label: Set Max
param.help: Specify maximum PI_HAT for inclusion in --genome report.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_homozyg_match
param.label: Set Homozyg match
param.help: Set minimum concordance across jointly homozygous variants for a pairwise allelic match to be declared.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_pool_size
param.label: Set Pool size
param.help: Set minimum size of pools in '--homozyg group' report.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_read_genome
param.label: Set Read genome
param.help: Load --genome report for --cluster/--neighbour, instead of recalculating IBS and PPC test p-values from scratch.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_ppc
param.label: Set Ppc
param.help: Specify minimum PPC test p-value within a cluster.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_mc
param.label: Set Mc
param.help: Specify maximum cluster size.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_mcc
param.label: Set Mcc
param.help: Specify maximum case and control counts per cluster.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_K
param.label: Set K
param.help: Specify minimum cluster count.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_ibm
param.label: Set Ibm
param.help: Specify minimum identity-by-missingness.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_match
param.label: Set Match
param.help: Use covariate values to restrict clustering. Without --match-type, two samples can only be in the same cluster if all covariates match. The optional second parameter specifies a covariate value to treat as missing.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_match_type
param.label: Set Match type
param.help: Refine interpretation of --match file. The --match-type file is expected to be a single line with as many entries as the --match file has covariates; '0' entries specify 'negative matches' (i.e. samples with equal covariate values cannot be in the same cluster), '1' entries specify 'positive matches' (default), and '-1' causes the corresponding covariate to be ignored.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_qmatch
param.label: Set Qmatch
param.help: Force all members of a cluster to have similar

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_pca_cluster_names
param.label: Set Pca cluster names
param.help: These can be used individually or in combination

param.name: pca_cluster_names_MOD_0_0
param.help: Multiple values are allowed

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_mds_plot
param.label: Set Mds plot
param.help: Multidimensional scaling analysis. Requires --cluster.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_cell
param.label: Set Cell
param.help: Skip some --model tests when a contingency table entry is smaller than the given threshold.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_condition
param.label: Set Condition
param.help: Add one variant as a --linear or --logistic covariate.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_condition_list
param.label: Set Condition list
param.help: Add variants named in the file as --linear/--logistic covs.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_parameters
param.label: Set Parameters
param.help: Include only the given covariates/interactions in the --linear/--logistic models, identified by a list of 1-based indices and/or ranges of them.

param.name: parameters_MOD_0_0
param.help: Multiple values are allowed

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_tests
param.label: Set Tests
param.help: Perform a (joint) test on the specified term(s) in the --linear/--logistic model, identified by 1-based indices and/or ranges of them. If permutation was requested, it is based on this test. * Note that, when --parameters is also present, the indices refer to the terms remaining AFTER pruning by --parameters. * You can use '--tests all' to include all terms.

param.name: tests_MOD_1_0
param.help: Multiple values are allowed

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_vif
param.label: Set Vif
param.help: Set VIF threshold for --linear multicollinearity check (default 50).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_xchr_model
param.label: Set Xchr model
param.help: Set the X chromosome --linear/--logistic model. 0 = skip sex and haploid chromosomes 1 (default) = add sex as a covariate on X chromosome 2 = code male genotypes 0/2 instead of 0/1 3 = test for interaction between genotype and sex

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_lasso_select_covars
param.label: Set Lasso select covars
param.help: Subject some or all covariates to LASSO model selection.

param.name: lasso_select_covars_MOD_0_0
param.label: cov(s)...
param.help: Multiple values are allowed

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_adjust
param.label: Set Adjust
param.help: Report some multiple-testing corrections.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_lambda
param.label: Set Lambda
param.help: Set genomic control lambda for --adjust.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_ci
param.label: Set Ci
param.help: Report confidence intervals for odds ratios.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_pfilter
param.label: Set Pfilter
param.help: Filter out association test results with higher p-values.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_aperm
param.label: Set Aperm
param.help: Set up to six parameters controlling adaptive permutation tests. * The first two control the minimum and maximum number of permutations that may be run for each variant; default values are 5 and 1000000. * The next two control the early termination condition. A 100% * (1 - beta/2T) confidence interval is calculated for each empirical p-value, where T is the total number of variants; whenever this confidence interval doesn't contain alpha, the variant is exempted from further permutation testing. Default values are 0 and 1e-4. * The last two control when the early termination condition is checked. If a check occurs at permutation #p, the next check occurs after [slope]p + [init interval] more permutations (rounded down). Default initial interval is 1, and default slope is 0.001.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_mperm_save
param.label: Set Mperm save
param.help: Save best max(T) permutation test statistics.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_mperm_save_all
param.label: Set Mperm save all
param.help: Save all max(T) permutation test statistics.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_set_p
param.label: Set Set p
param.help: Adjust set test significant variant p-value ceiling (default 0.05).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_set_r2
param.label: Set Set r2
param.help: Adjust set test significant variant pairwise r^2 ceiling (default 0.5). 'write' causes violating pairs to be dumped to {output prefix}.ldset.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_set_max
param.label: Set Set max
param.help: Adjust set test maximum # of significant variants considered per set (default 5).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_set_test_lambda
param.label: Set Set test lambda
param.help: Specify genomic control correction for set test.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_border
param.label: Set Border
param.help: Extend --annotate range intervals by given # kbs.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_annotate_snp_field
param.label: Set Annotate snp field
param.help: Set --annotate variant ID field name.

param.help: Set --clump index var. p-value ceiling (default 1e-4).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_p2
param.label: Set Clump p2
param.help: Set --clump secondary p-value threshold (default 0.01).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_r2
param.label: Set Clump r2
param.help: Set --clump r^2 threshold (default 0.5).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_kb
param.label: Set Clump kb
param.help: Set --clump kb radius (default 250).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_snp_field
param.label: Set Clump snp field
param.help: Set --clump variant ID field name (default 'SNP'). With multiple field names, earlier names take precedence over later ones.

param.name: clump_snp_field_MOD_0_0
param.label: n...
param.help: Multiple values are allowed

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_field

param.help: Set --clump p-value field name (default 'P').

param.name: clump_field_MOD_0_0
param.label: name...
param.help: Multiple values are allowed

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_allow_overlap

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_verbose

param.help: Request extended --clump report.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_annotate
param.label: Set Clump annotate

param.name: clump_annotate_MOD_0_0
param.label: hdr...

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_range
param.label: Set Clump range
param.help: Report overlaps between clumps and regions.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_range_border
param.label: Set Clump range border
param.help: Stretch regions in --clump-range file.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_index_first
param.label: Set Clump index first
param.help: Extract --clump index vars. from only first file.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_replicate
param.label: Set Clump replicate

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_clump_best
param.label: Set Clump best

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_meta_analysis_snp_field
param.label: Set Meta analysis snp field
param.help: Set --meta-analysis variant ID, A1/A2

param.name: meta_analysis_snp_field_MOD_0_0
param.label: n...

param.label: n...
param.help: Multiple values are allowed

param.name: meta_analysis_a2_field_MOD_0_0

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_gene_list_border
param.label: Set Gene list border
param.help: Extend --gene-report regions by given # of kbs.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_gene_subset
param.label: Set Gene subset

param.help: Set --gene-report variant ID field name (default 'SNP'). Only relevant with --extract.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_gap

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_epi1

param.help: Set --{fast-}epistasis reporting threshold (default 5e-6 for 'boost', 1e-4 otherwise).

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_epi2

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_je_cellmin

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_q_score_range
param.label: Set Q score range
param.help: Apply --score to subset(s) of variants in the primary score list based on e.g. p-value ranges. * The first file should have range labels in the first column, p-value lower bounds in the second column, and upper bounds in the third column. Lines with too few entries, or nonnumeric values in the second or third column, are ignored. * The second file should contain a variant ID and a p-value on each nonempty line (except possibly the first). Variant IDs are read from column #i and p-values are read from column #j, where i defaults to 1 and j defaults to i+1. The 'header' modifier causes the first nonempty line of this file to be skipped.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_memory
param.label: Set Memory
param.help: Set size, in MB, of initial workspace malloc attempt. (Practically mandatory when using GNU parallel.)

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_threads
param.label: Set Threads
param.help: Set maximum number of concurrent threads. This has one known limitation: some BLAS/LAPACK linear algebra operations are multithreaded in a way that PLINK cannot control. If this is problematic, you should recompile against single-threaded BLAS/LAPACK.

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_d
param.label: Set D
param.help: Change variant/covariate range delimiter (normally '-').

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_seed
param.label: Set Seed
param.help: Set random number seed(s). Each value must be an integer between 0 and 4294967295 inclusive.

param.name: seed_MOD_0_0
param.label: val...
param.help: Multiple values are allowed

param.name: CONDITIONAL_SELECT_perm_batch_size
